languages.text: "Что?! Что?!" {n}Абеляр теряет дар речи. А когда обретает, не может остановиться:{/n} "Это ошибка. Клевета, направленная против человека, который мертв и даже не может защитить свое доброе имя! Сначала служки Архиврага убили Лорд-капитана Теодору, а теперь... Недопустимо. Невозможно!"

traits.locale_text: "Что?! Что?!" {n}Абеляр теряет дар речи. А когда обретает, не может остановиться:{/n} "Это ошибка. Наветы Хаоса. Клевета, направленная против человека, который мертв и даже не может защитить свое доброе имя! Сначала служки хаоса убили Лорд-капитана Теодору, а теперь... Недопустимо. Невозможно!"

languages.text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of the Archenemy murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"
languages.original_text: "Что?! Что?!" {n}Абеляр теряет дар речи. А когда обретает, не может остановиться:{/n} "Это ошибка. Клевета, направленная против человека, который мертв и даже не может защитить свое доброе имя! Сначала служки Архиврага убили Лорд-капитана Теодору, а теперь... Недопустимо. Невозможно!"

traits.locale_text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. But once he has composed himself, they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. A libel of Chaos. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of Chaos murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of Chaos murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

It WILL not be tolerated!"

"What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. A libel of Chaos. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of Chaos murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

languages.text: «Un momento, ¿QUÉ?». {n}Abelard se queda sin palabras. Se toma un tiempo para recomponerse, y comienza a tartamudear apresuradamente:{/n} «Esto es un error. ¡Una calumnia destinada a manchar el buen nombre de una persona que ahora está muerta y ni siquiera puede defenderse! Primero esos secuaces del Archienemigo asesinan a la Lord Capitán Theodora, y ahora... ¡Esto no se puede tolerar! ¡Y no se tolerará!».
languages.original_text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of the Archenemy murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

traits.locale_text: «Un momento, ¿QUÉ?». {n}Abelard se queda sin palabras. Se toma un tiempo para recomponerse, y comienza a tartamudear apresuradamente:{/n} «Esto es grave, una difamación del Caos. ¡Una calumnia destinada a manchar el buen nombre de una persona que ahora está muerta y ni siquiera puede defenderse! Primero esos secuaces del Caos asesinan a la Lord Capitán Theodora, y ahora... ¡Esto no se puede tolerar! ¡Y no se tolerará!».

languages.text: "Was? WAS?" {n}Abelard fehlen die Worte. Er sammelt sich kurz, dann sprudelt es in einem überstürzten Schwall aus ihm heraus:{/n} "Das ist ein Irrtum. Verleumdung, die den guten Namen einer Person in den Dreck ziehen soll, die nun tot ist und sich nicht einmal mehr verteidigen kann! Erst haben diese Schergen des Erzfeinds Lord Captain Theodora ermordet, und nun ... Das darf nicht hingenommen werden! Das WIRD nicht hingenommen werden!"
languages.original_text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of the Archenemy murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

traits.locale_text: "Was? WAS?" {n}Abelard fehlen die Worte. Er sammelt sich kurz, dann sprudelt es in einem überstürzten Schwall aus ihm heraus:{/n} "Das ist ein Irrtum. Ein Rufmord des Chaos. Verleumdung, die den guten Namen einer Person in den Dreck ziehen soll, die nun tot ist und sich nicht einmal mehr verteidigen kann! Erst haben diese Schergen des Chaos Lord Captain Theodora ermordet, und nun ... Das darf nicht hingenommen werden! Das WIRD nicht hingenommen werden!"

languages.text: « Quoi ? COMMENT ? » {n}Abélard reste bouche bée. Il prend quelques instants pour se ressaisir, puis vous sort tous les mots qui lui passent par la tête :{/n} « C'est une erreur. Une diffamation visant à jeter le déshonneur sur le nom d'une personne aujourd'hui décédée, et donc bien incapable de se défendre ! D'abord, ces sbires du Grand Ennemi assassinent la seigneure-capitaine Théodora, et maintenant... C'est intolérable ! Je ne le tolérerai pas ! »
languages.original_text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of the Archenemy murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? COMMENT ? » {n}Abélard reste bouche bée. Il prend quelques instants pour se ressaisir, puis vous sort tous les mots qui lui passent par la tête :{/n} « C'est une erreur. Une calomnie du Chaos. Une diffamation visant à jeter le déshonneur sur le nom d'une personne aujourd'hui décédée, et donc bien incapable de se défendre ! D'abord, ces sbires du Chaos assassine la seigneure-capitaine Théodora, et maintenant... C'est intolérable ! Je ne le tolérerai pas ! »

languages.text: “什么？什么！？”{n}阿贝拉德一时语塞。他花了好一会儿来整理自己的思绪，随后滔滔不绝地脱口而出。{/n}“这是个误会，是恶意中伤。他们打玷污夫人的名声，而夫人已经死了，没办法自我辩白！这些混沌大敌的爪牙，他们先是谋杀了西奥多拉舰长大人，现在又……不可饶恕！这种恶行绝对不可饶恕！”
languages.original_text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of the Archenemy murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

traits.locale_text: “什么？什么！？”{n}阿贝拉德一时语塞。他花了好一会儿来整理自己的思绪，随后滔滔不绝地脱口而出。{/n}“这是个误会，是混沌势力的恶意中伤。他们打算毁掉夫人的名声，而夫人已经死了，没办法自我辩白！这些混沌的爪牙，先是谋杀了西奥多拉舰长大人，现在又……不可饶恕！这种恶行绝对不可饶恕！”

languages.text: 「な…何ですって？」{n}アベラルドは言葉を失う。彼は一息ついて気を取り直すと、慌ただしく話し始めた。{/n}「何かの間違いです。すでに亡くなっていて、自己弁護すらできない人物の名誉を傷つけることを目的とした誹謗中傷です！初めは渾沌の勢力の手下たちがロード・キャプテン・シオドーラ様を手にかけ、今度は…こんなことは許されません！許されるものではありません！」
languages.original_text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of the Archenemy murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

traits.locale_text: 「な…何だって？」{n}アベラルドは言葉を失う。彼は一息ついて気を取り直すと、バーッと慌ただしく言葉を並べ始めた。{/n}「何かの間違いだ。渾沌の悪意ある攻撃です。こうやって、この世を去った釈明もできない人物の名誉を傷つけるつもりなんです ! 初めは渾沌の手先達がロード・キャプテン・シオドーラを手にかけて、今度は…こんなことは許せない！許せるものか！」
「な…何ですって？」{n}アベラルドは言葉を失う。彼は一息ついて気を取り直すと、慌ただしく話し始めた。{/n}「何かの間違いです。すでに亡くなっていて、自己弁護すらできない人物の名誉を傷つけることを目的とした誹謗中傷です！初めは渾沌の勢力の手下たちがロード・キャプテン・シオドーラ様を手にかけ、今度は…こんなことは許されません！許されるものではありません！」

languages.text: "Ne? NE?" {n}Abelard söyleyecek söz bulamıyor. Kendisini toplamakla geçirdiği bir saniyenin ardından kelimeler ağzından üst üste saçılmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bir yanlışlık var. Merhum ve kendini savunamayacak birinin namını lekelemek için ortaya atılmış pis iftiralar! O Şerbaşı yardakçıları evvela Lord Kaptan Theodora'yı öldürdü, şimdiyse... Buna göz yumulamaz! İzin VERMEM!"
languages.original_text: "What? WHAT?" {n}Abelard is at a loss for words. He takes a moment to collect himself, and all at once they start pouring out in a hasty sputter:{/n} "It's a mistake. Slander meant to blemish the good name of a person who is now dead and cannot even defend herself! First those minions of the Archenemy murdered Lord Captain Theodora, and now... This cannot be tolerated! It WILL not be tolerated!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne? NE?" {n}Abelard söyleyecek söz bulamıyor. Kendisini toplamakla geçirdiği bir saniyenin ardından kelimeler ağzından üst üste saçılmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bir yanlışlık var. Merhum ve kendini savunamayacak birinin namını lekelemek için ortaya atılmış pis iftiralar! O Şerbaşı yardakçıları evvela Lord Kaptan Theodora'yı öldürdü, şimdiyse... Buna göz yumulamaz! İzin VERMEM!"
